description: Oddish numbers (prime to 10 and 10's digit is odd).
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (Haskell)a045798 n = a045798_list !! (n-1)a045798_list = filter (odd . (`mod` 10) . (`div` 10)) a045572_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 10 2011
crossrefs: Complement of A045797 with respect to A045572.
author: _J. H. Conway_.
